text: ma taebudun min dun allah 'iilaa asma'an la maeani wra'ha, jeltmwha 'antum wabawukum arbabana jhla minkum wdlala, ma 'anzal allah min hujat 'aw burhan ealaa shtha, ma alhukm alhaqi 'iilaa lilah taealaa whdh, la sharik lh, 'amar 'alaa tnqadu wala tkhdeu lghyrh, wa'ana tebdwh whdh, whdha hu aldiyn alqayim aldhy la eiwaj fyh, wlkn 'akthar alnaas yajhalun dhlk, fala yaelamun hqyqth
